item.description:
Volunteering with WBUR is fun: During each shift delicious food from some of Boston’s best restaurants is provided for free, a behind-the-scenes tour of WBUR, free parking and a fun, friendly atmosphere. Plus, there's that great feeling of helping to support public radio!

SIGN UP AT : http://www.wbur.org/community/volunteer

Important: Indicates BOSTON ROTARACT in Group/Business!!!! If 3 or more people volunteer, the Boston Rotaract will receive an on-air thank you and a short blurb

Multiple Shift Availability, before and after work!
Monday, March 18, 2013 — 6:30AM - 9:00AM
Monday, March 18, 2013 — 8:45AM - 12:15PM
Monday, March 18, 2013 — 3:30PM - 7:00PM
Tuesday, March 19, 2013 — 6:30AM - 9:00AM
Tuesday, March 19, 2013 — 8:45AM - 12:15PM
Tuesday, March 19, 2013 — 12:00 PM - 3:45 PM
Tuesday, March 19, 2013 — 3:30PM - 7:00PM
Tuesday, March 19, 2013 — 5:00PM - 7:00PM
Wednesday, March 20, 2013 — 6:30AM - 9:00AM
Wednesday, March 20, 2013 — 8:45AM - 12:15PM
Wednesday, March 20, 2013 — 12:00PM - 3:45PM
Thursday, March 21, 2013 — 6:30AM - 9:00AM
Thursday, March 21, 2013 — 8:45AM - 12:15PM
Thursday, March 21, 2013 — 3:30PM - 7:00PM
Thursday, March 21, 2013 — 5:00PM - 7:00PM
Friday, March 22, 2013 — 6:30AM - 9:00AM
Friday, March 22, 2013 — 8:45AM - 12:15PM
Friday, March 22, 2013 — 12:00PM - 3:45PM
Friday, March 22, 2013 — 3:30PM - 7:00PM
Friday, March 22, 2013 — 5:00PM - 7:00PM

Directions:
WBUR is located at 890 Commonwealth Ave., but the entrance to the building is on St. Paul St. Walk a few yards along St. Paul and you’ll see the entrance clearly signed. We’re on the third floor. (http://www.wbur.org/about/directions)

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Volunteer During an On-Air Fundraiser @ 90.9 WBUR!!!
